#### Today's Experience

- Visit **Buddha Dordenma (Buddha Point)**: A massive 51m bronze statue overlooking the valley.
- **Tashichho Dzong**: The fortress of the glorious religion, housing the King's throne room.
- **National Memorial Chorten**: Built in memory of the Third King.
- **Simply Bhutan Museum**: Experience living Bhutanese culture.
- **Motithang Takin Preserve**: See the national animal (Takin).

:::

::: {.column width="40%"}

::: {.history-insight .callout-note}
#### ğŸ“œ History Insight â€“ Buddha Dordenma
Completed in 2015 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Fourth King, this statue houses **125,000 smaller Buddha statues** inside it, fulfilling an ancient prophecy.

### DAY 4: Excursion to Punakha & Dochu La Pass
:::
::: {.day-route}
ğŸ“ Thimphu â†’ Punakha â†’ Thimphu | ğŸš— Full Day | ğŸ¨ Overnight: Thimphu
:::
:::

::: {.day-content}
:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}
#### Today's Experience

- Drive to **Dochu La Pass** (3,100m). View the 108 Memorial Chortens and Himalayan range.
- Proceed to **Punakha Valley**.
- Visit **Punakha Dzong**: The "Palace of Great Happiness".
- Walk across the **Suspension Bridge** (Longest in Bhutan).
- Optional: River Rafting in Mo Chhu river.
- Return to Thimphu by evening.

:::

::: {.column width="40%"}

::: {.history-insight .callout-note}
#### ğŸ“œ History Insight â€“ Punakha Dzong
Built in **1637**, this is the second oldest and second largest dzong in Bhutan. It served as the capital and seat of government until the mid-1950s and hosts the royal wedding.
:::

#### Today's Experience

- Scenic drive to **Paro Valley**.

::: {.column width="40%"}

#### ğŸ“œ History Insight â€“ Paro Dzong
Built in **1646** by Ngawang Namgyal, this fortress defended the valley against invasions from Tibet. Scenes from the movie *Little Buddha* were filmed here.

#### Today's Experience

- Drive to **Chelela Pass** (3,988m), the highest motorable road in Bhutan.

- Spot thousands of prayer flags fluttering in the wind.
- Visit a **Traditional Dressing Center** (Try the Kira and Gho).
- Farewell dinner at the hotel.

:::

::: {.column width="40%"}

#### ğŸ“œ History Insight â€“ Chelela Pass
